title: Riot wanted to make Aatrox easier to to play from behind...BUT THE OPPOSITE HAPPEND.
body:
BECAUSE, if you do fall behind and start getting zoned in lane it becomes VERY hard to stack to Blood Rush so you can have the revive. Meaning you are very open to being tower dived, and since Aatrox is very squishy in terms of his kit, this is very bad.

GOOD JOB riot, you made the champion weaker in the very thing you sough to improve.

replies.body:
Aatrox is the guy who's a diver but doesn't dive because he dies instantly but when he doesn't he can't dive because his only diving tool got CC'd but when it isn't he doesn't deal any kind of relevant damage.

Yup that's the guy.
there are literally buffs going to aatrox tonight when the patch hits.
Haha those changes won't substantially increase his win rate. Those changes help him after he revives.  REVIVING is the problem currently. Don't be daft.

The riot team is composed of chimpanzee, and even worse, Ghostcrawler. Hell, common sense is enough to tell that those changes would be enough, and they couldn't even figure it out by playtesting it???
Yup. It boggles the mind. Its like egos and agendas are more important.
